txt.en: In the Sword-hall of Dol Guldur, the fell champions of the arena train tirelessly to hone their prowess in battle. You have been challenged to prove your superior might by defeating all three champions of the Sword-hall at once.
Challenge: Battle of the Sword-hall Completed
Light the Challenger's Brazier, then engage and defeat all three champions at once
The Sword-hall is at Dol Guldur, the enemy stronghold of Mirkwood.\n\nYou should endeavour to defeat all three champions of the Sword-hall at once -- a great challenge that will earn you much renown.
Do not leave the arena during the challenge
